titleStmt.title: A short discourse about our keeping our money shewing that our money may be kept among our selves, and yet our confederates strongly assisted, by a descent upon France. By E.L.
titleStmt.author: Littleton, Edward, b. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by B. Motte, and are to be sold by John Whitlock near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
